gw.api.dashboard

Interface DashboardStatsHelper


  • public interface DashboardStatsHelper
    The portion of the dashboard statistics interface that is available from Gosu
    Author:
    tmorris

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<DashboardStats> getCoverageTypeStats()
      A list of DashboardStats categorized by coverage type.
      java.lang.String getIncurredLimitTip()
      The total incurred amount above which the dashboard will count the claim as over the limit
      java.util.List<DashboardStats> getLOBStats()
      A list of DashboardStats categorized by Line Of Business.
      java.util.List<DashboardStats> getLossTypeStats()
      A list of DashboardStats categorized by loss type.
      DashboardStats[] getOrgStatsAsArray(Group[] groups)
      Return the dashboard statistics by group, one DashboardStats object for each group in the argument array
      java.lang.String getPeriod()
      The number of days used for calculations that depend on a period (for example the open claims statistic means the number of open claims in the given period)
      java.util.Date getWhenLastCalculated()
      The date and time when dashboard statistics were last calculated
      java.lang.String getWhenLastCalculatedString()
      The date and time when dashboard statistics were last calculated, formatted as a string using the "short" format specified in localization.xml

    • Method Detail

      • getOrgStatsAsArray

        DashboardStats[] getOrgStatsAsArray(Group[] groups)
        Return the dashboard statistics by group, one DashboardStats object for each group in the argument array
        Parameters:
        groups - the groups for which to return statistics
        Returns:
        the statistics for the given groups

      • getLOBStats

        java.util.List<DashboardStats> getLOBStats()
        A list of DashboardStats categorized by Line Of Business. The LOB of each DashboardStats object can be determined from its DashboardStats.LOBCode property

      • getLossTypeStats

        java.util.List<DashboardStats> getLossTypeStats()
        A list of DashboardStats categorized by loss type. The loss type of each DashboardStats object can be determined from its DashboardStats.LossType property

      • getCoverageTypeStats

        java.util.List<DashboardStats> getCoverageTypeStats()
        A list of DashboardStats categorized by coverage type. The coverage type of each DashboardStats object can be determined from its DashboardStats.CoverageType property

      • getWhenLastCalculated

        java.util.Date getWhenLastCalculated()
        The date and time when dashboard statistics were last calculated

      • getWhenLastCalculatedString

        java.lang.String getWhenLastCalculatedString()
        The date and time when dashboard statistics were last calculated, formatted as a string using the "short" format specified in localization.xml

      • getPeriod

        java.lang.String getPeriod()
        The number of days used for calculations that depend on a period (for example the open claims statistic means the number of open claims in the given period)

      • getIncurredLimitTip

        java.lang.String getIncurredLimitTip()
        The total incurred amount above which the dashboard will count the claim as over the limit
